FlowGraph
Table of Contents

Class EdgeVisualManager

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Manages rendering and tracking of edge visuals including paths, markers, and labels. Responsible for creating, updating, and removing edge UI elements.

public class EdgeVisualManager

public EdgeVisualManager(RenderContext renderContext, NodeVisualManager nodeVisualManager, EdgeRendererRegistry? edgeRendererRegistry = null)

Parameters

renderContext RenderContext

Shared render context.

nodeVisualManager NodeVisualManager

Node visual manager for port position calculations.

edgeRendererRegistry EdgeRendererRegistry

Optional registry for custom edge renderers.

Methods

Clear()

Clears all tracked edge visuals. Note: This does not remove them from the canvas.

public void Clear()

Renders a single edge with its markers and optional label.
